summary:
I have over 25 years of experience in human resources and facilities management.
Having first spent the early part of my career in human resources management with large multinationals, I later on moved to a senior executive position in facility management in one of the globally largest firms in facility management.
Since 2006, I manage my own consultancy firm, consulting and advising mostly multinational globally operating companies with regard to facility management and HR outsourcing.
I gained my extensive breadth of knowledge in both operational and strategic roles, and from positions on both client and supply sides. 

I have a Postgraduate Diploma in Facilities Management, hold IFMA's globally-recognised CFM qualification and I am a Certified Member of BIFM (CBIFM). 

Specialties: Facilities consulting, FM strategy development, supply option appraisal, tender/outsource management, performance measurement, contract management, facilities audit/review, training & development, property asset management, organisational change

profile_positions.description:
Planning, Managing & Executing…

Facility Management Consultants (RBFM) specializes in partnering with our clients to provide tailored, integrated solutions for facility change related challenges. We work with you to manage the costs and risk of your project, minimize downtime, and maximize your return on investment.

You’ll benefit from our flexible and comprehensive menu of services – we’ll work with you to develop a custom plan that fits your needs and budget. Think of us as an extension of your team. We give you the resources you need to plan, execute and manage your project successfully without taking your in-house staff away from the day-to-day operations of your business. Our industry knowledge and exceptional level of service provides you with proven systems and tools to ensure your project is a success.
profile_positions.title: CEO

profile_positions.description:
Sodexo (formerly Sodexho Alliance) is a French food services and facilities management multinational corporation headquartered in the Paris suburb of Issy-les-Moulineaux, France.[2] Sodexo is one of the largest companies in the world in its business, with 380,000 employees, representing 130 nationalities, present on 34,000 sites in 80 countries. For fiscal year 2010 (ending August 2009) revenues reached 15.3 billion euros, with a market capitalization of 6.5 billion euros. Revenues by region represent: 37% Continental Europe, 38% North America, 8% UK and Ireland, 17% Rest of World.
Sodexo is organized into two entities, dubbed "On-Site Service Solutions" and "Motivation Solutions".[clarification needed] Sodexo services many sectors including private corporations, government agencies, schools from elementary through university, hospitals and clinics, assisted-living facilities, military bases, and correctional facilities.
profile_positions.title: Senior Director of Business Development

profile_positions.description:
Koninklijke Luchtvaart Maatschappij N.V. (KLM Royal Dutch Airlines), known by its initials KLM, is the flag carrier airline of the Netherlands. KLM's headquarters is in Amstelveen near its hub at Amsterdam Airport Schiphol. KLM operates worldwide scheduled passenger and cargo services to more than 90 destinations. It is the oldest airline in the world still operating under its original name. As of 31 March 2010 it had 31,787 employees.[2]
The merger of KLM with Air France in May 2004 created Air France-KLM, which is incorporated under French law with headquarters at Paris-Charles de Gaulle Airport. Both Air France and KLM continue to fly under their distinct brand names. Air France-KLM is part of the SkyTeam alliance.
profile_positions.title: Human Resources Director

profile_positions.description: South African Airways (SAA) is the national flag carrier and largest airline of South Africa, with headquarters in Airways Park on the grounds of OR Tambo International Airport in Kempton Park, Ekurhuleni, Gauteng. The airline flies to 38 destinations worldwide from its hub at OR Tambo International Airport, using a fleet of 54 aircraft. The airline is headed by CEO Monwabisi Kalawe
profile_positions.title: Human Resources Manager
